languages.text: "Жертву звали Орто, в день смерти он обслуживал клапан 27-Б, отвечающий за подачу воды в купальню. У него был напарник, который с момента покушения не заступал на вахту. У нас есть подозреваемый".

"The victim's name was Orto. On the day he died, he was servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's bathchamber. He also had a partner, who has yet to appear for duty since the incident occurred. We have a suspect."
languages.original_text: "Жертву звали Орто, в день смерти он обслуживал клапан 27-Б, отвечающий за подачу воды в купальню. У него был напарник, который с момента покушения не заступал на вахту. У нас есть подозреваемый".

traits.locale_text: "The victim's name was Orto, and on the day he died, he was servicing the valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's bathchamber. Orto had a partner. This partner has not appeared on duty since the incident. We have a suspect."

languages.text: « La victime répondait au nom d'Orto. Le jour où il est mort, il était de service au niveau de la valve 27-B, qui assure l'alimentation en eau de la cabine de bain {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Il avait également un partenaire, qui ne s'est plus présenté à son poste depuis que l'incident s'est produit. Autrement dit, nous avons un suspect. »
languages.original_text: "The victim's name was Orto. On the day he died, he was servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's bathchamber. He also had a partner, who has yet to appear for duty since the incident occurred. We have a suspect."

traits.locale_text: « La victime répondait au nom d'Orto. Le jour où il est mort, il était de service au niveau de la valve 27-B, qui assure l'alimentation en eau de la cabine de bain {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Il avait également un partenaire, qui ne s'est plus présenté à son poste depuis que l'incident s'est produit. Autrement dit, nous avons un suspect. »

languages.text: «El nombre de la víctima era Orto. El día que murió, estaba trabajando en la válvula 27-B, que suministra agua a la cámara de baño de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. También tenía un compañero que no ha vuelto a su puesto desde el incidente. Tenemos un sospechoso».
languages.original_text: "The victim's name was Orto. On the day he died, he was servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's bathchamber. He also had a partner, who has yet to appear for duty since the incident occurred. We have a suspect."

traits.locale_text: «El nombre de la víctima era Orto. El día que murió, estaba trabajando en la válvula 27-B, que suministra agua a la cámara de baño de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. También tenía un compañero que no ha vuelto a su puesto desde el incidente. Tenemos un sospechoso».

languages.text: “受害者的名字叫奥托，死亡当天负责维护27-B号阀门，这个阀门负责给行商浪人的浴室供水。他还有一名工友，但事故发生之后，他的工友便再也没有出现在工作岗位上。我们已经找到了嫌疑人。”
languages.original_text: "The victim's name was Orto. On the day he died, he was servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's bathchamber. He also had a partner, who has yet to appear for duty since the incident occurred. We have a suspect."

traits.locale_text: “受害者的名字叫奥托，死亡当天负责维护27-B号阀门，这个阀门负责给行商浪人的浴室供水。他还有一名工友，但事故发生之后，他的工友便再也没有出现在工作岗位上。我们已经找到了嫌疑人。”

languages.text: 「被害者の名前はオートといいます。彼が亡くなった日、彼ははローグトレーダーの浴室に水を供給する場所の、バルブ27-Bを整備していました。彼には相棒もいましたが、事件発生以来、まだ出勤していないようです。これで、容疑者が見つかったのではないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "The victim's name was Orto. On the day he died, he was servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's bathchamber. He also had a partner, who has yet to appear for duty since the incident occurred. We have a suspect."

traits.locale_text: 「被害者の名前はオートといいます。彼が亡くなった日、彼ははローグトレーダーの浴室に水を供給する場所の、バルブ27-Bを整備していました。彼には相棒もいましたが、事件発生以来、まだ出勤していないようです。これで、容疑者が見つかったのではないでしょうか」

languages.text: "Das Opfer hieß Orto. Am Tag seines Todes war er gerade damit beschäftigt, Ventil 27-B zu warten, welches das Badegemach {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} mit Wasser versorgt. Er hatte auch einen Partner, der jedoch seit dem Zwischenfall nicht zum Dienst erschienen ist. Wir haben einen Verdächtigen."
languages.original_text: "The victim's name was Orto. On the day he died, he was servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's bathchamber. He also had a partner, who has yet to appear for duty since the incident occurred. We have a suspect."

traits.locale_text: "Das Opfer hieß Orto. Am Tag seines Todes war er gerade damit beschäftigt, Ventil 27-B zu warten, welches das Badegemach {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} mit Wasser versorgt. Er hatte auch einen Partner, der jedoch seit dem Zwischenfall nicht zum Dienst erschienen ist. Wir haben einen Verdächtigen."

languages.text: "Kurbanın adı Orto'ydu. Öldüğü gün Hür Tacir'in hamamına su sağlayan 27-B numaralı vanada hizmet veriyordu. Aynı zamanda bir ortağı da vardı. Ortağı, hadise yaşandığından bu yana vazifesinin başında görülmedi. Elimizde bir şüpheli var."
languages.original_text: "The victim's name was Orto. On the day he died, he was servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's bathchamber. He also had a partner, who has yet to appear for duty since the incident occurred. We have a suspect."
